name: Tressure Trove
description:
Tressure Trove is a simple platformer game made using Godot Game Engine. It's a short game made within one month. The game has a difficulty which some can easily pass through, while some just have a hard time passing through.  This game was made for the core mechanic jam , therefore using the Core Mechanic of Mega Man X, that is a platformer game with shooting.

Game_Controls :-

Arrow Keys:- for movements

Up arrow key:- to climb ladders

Tab:- to shoot fireballs

Credits:-
